name: City Patron Godess
uniques: [+25]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in this city] <before the [Classical era]>

name: God of Healing
uniques: [All] Units adjacent to this city heal [+30] HP per turn when healing

name: God of the Forge
uniques: [+25]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in this city] <before the [Medieval era]>

name: God of War
uniques: Earn [100]% of [Military] unit's [Strength] as [Faith] when killed within 4 tiles of a city following this religion

name: Initiation Rites
uniques: [+50 Faith] when a city adopts this religion for the first time (modified by game speed)

name: Lady of the Reeds and Marshes
Monument to the Gods
uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities] <before the [Medieval era]>

name: Religious Settlements
uniques: [+50]% Production when constructing [Settler] units [in this city]
[-15]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in this city]

name: Cathedral
uniques: May buy [Cathedral] buildings for [380] [Faith] [in cities following this religion]

uniques: May buy [Dar-e Mehr] buildings for [380] [Faith] [in cities following this religion]

name: Wat

name: Warrior Monks
uniques: May buy [Warrior Monk] units for [200] [Faith] [in all cities] <in cities with a [Temple]>

name: Zen meditation
uniques: [+1 Happiness] <if this city has at least [1] specialists>

name: Cross-Cultural Dialogue
uniques: [+1 Science] for every [4] global followers [in all cities]

name: Tithe
uniques: [+3 Gold] for each global city following this religion

name: Religious Unity
uniques: Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [50]% more Influence

name: Pilgrimage
uniques: [+2 Faith] for each global city following this religion

name: Sacred Places
uniques: [+2 Science, +2 Culture, +2 Gold, +2 Faith] from every [Wonder]

name: World Church
uniques: [+1 Culture] for every [4] global followers [in all cities]

name: Crusade
uniques: [+20]% Strength <for [Non-City] units> <when fighting in [Enemy Land] tiles>

name: Defender of the Faith
uniques: [+10]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>

name: Itinerant Preachers
uniques: Religion naturally spreads to cities [+3] tiles away

name: Religious Colonization
uniques: [+50]% Natural religion spread [in all cities connected to capital]

name: Scripture
uniques: [+25]% Natural religion spread [in all cities] <after discovering [Printing]>
